verses.verse: See how good <S%H2896><s%> and how pleasant <S%H5273><s%> it is for brothers <S%H251><s%> to live <S%H3427><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in unity! <S%H3162><s%>

It is like the precious <S%H2896><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> on the head, <S%H7218><s%> that ran down <S%H3381><s%> on the beard, <S%H2206><s%> even Aaron <S%H175><s%>'s beard; <S%H2206><s%> that came down <S%H3381><s%> on the edge <S%H6310><s%> of his robes; <S%H4060><s%>

like the dew <S%H2919><s%> of Hermon, <S%H2768><s%> that comes down <S%H3381><s%> on the hills <S%H2042><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for there Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H6680><s%> the blessing, <S%H1293><s%> even life <S%H2416><s%> forevermore. <S%H5769><s%>
